page.title: 05Peak Dale School's Festival
page.content: On Friday,12th July it was our Summer Festival.We have a School Queen .This year Michelle Wood was the School Queen and her sister Julie,the Retiring Queen,crowned her.Mr Woodward,one of our teachers,decorated the hall with ribbons and streamers. The infants decorated card with pictures of monsters. Class 1 sang two songs from Music Workshop called "Look Around"and "Fine New Shoes".Class 2 recited a poem called "Matilda Who Told Lies". Class 1 then performed a play called "The Indeciferable Letter" which was adapted from a story by Norman Hunter.The infants then did a play called "The Land of Dragons and Monsters" .Lots of people came to watch and enjoyed our Summer Festival. Louise Holmes
